trends: There have been no other sightings in Sam Marcos
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my hot tub about 10 pm, I looked up with a dark sky and noticed an object moving slowly east. It was triangular, about the size of my small fingernail held at arm's length. No running lights and I noticed it did eclipse the stars in the background night sky as it moved over them. It was a dark brown or grey color, maybe from the reflected city lights. No sound, I knew I did not have enough time to get my camera so I just sat there for about 1 minute as it disappeared over my house to the east. Camp Pendleton is about 15 miles due west of me so my guess is that it came from there. I have never seen an aircraft like that and have been to many airports all over the world including some military.
Summary: Eastbound, very slow, no lights, Triangular
